name: Traffic Cop Motorbike Rider 3D
description:
Are you skilled to ride cops motorbike and chase the bad guys in this action filled racing game?

Jump on motorbike and ride on city traffic filled roads to chase bad guys.
Hit siren and ride fast to chase and arrest illegal racers on the roads.
Enjoy thrilling motorbike ride in action filled bike riding game.
Drive fast don’t let the bad guys escape your sight to keep the city safe.
Enjoy playing traffic cop motorbike rider 3D game on your Apple phone and tablets.


Give us your feedback with comments so we can make more games to entertain you.
